title: Experiment With Fonts For Free, Using SkyFonts Client
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322011718im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SkyFonts-Trial_4483.png)

Fonts.com is offering free trials of desktop fonts using Monotype’s [SkyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322011718/http:/skyfonts.com/)™ client, which allows you to temporarily install and trial fonts within documents for up to five minutes.

You can read more on the Fonts.com blog: [http://bit.ly/1d15Rtm](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322011718/http:/bit.ly/1d15Rtm "http://bit.ly/1d15Rtm")

And learn more about SkyFonts here: [http://bit.ly/IKgHej](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322011718/http:/bit.ly/IKgHej "http://bit.ly/IKgHej")
author: Monotype
